amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 577, the amendments to the text and preamble specified in section 11 of the resolution are considered adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 577, the amendments to the text and preamble specified in section 11 of the resolution are considered adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
